attributes.action: Give the hard working Police Officers of this Country a fair pay deal and give them the money they deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Police officers keep this country safe 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and as is the case in modern times increasingly putting their lives on the line to protect the innocent and stand up for justice.

This Government is failing these men and women and insulting them with a pay deal that would only give them a 1.9% pay rise.  This is unacceptable.  All so often we hear about how much the government value the Police Officers in this Country.  I say time to put your money where your mouth is and give these people what they rightly deserve.
